risk_bands.label: Baseline Institutional Noise
risk_bands.description: Normal democratic conflict and routine legal contestation.

risk_bands.label: Elevated Strain
risk_bands.description: Repeated norm-breaking attempts, but institutional checks mostly holding.

risk_bands.label: Serious Constitutional Stress
risk_bands.description: Sustained pressure campaigns on checks and balances.

risk_bands.label: Crisis Trajectory
risk_bands.description: Institutions are under material stress with higher risk of structural change.

risk_bands.label: Acute Constitutional Crisis
risk_bands.description: Multiple constitutional guardrails are weakening simultaneously.

risk_bands.label: Near-Failure
risk_bands.description: Reversal is difficult without major institutional response.

risk_bands.label: Constitutional Failure / Overturn
risk_bands.description: Core constitutional transfer, checks, or rights protections have effectively failed.
